text: Ass ideg ara ten Ifser meôôa: "a yagraw n leonun, ni$ tcerrâem deg imdanen"? A d inin imawlan nnsen, seg imdanen: "a Mass nne$! Kra segne$ $elten si kra, Nebbwev ar lajel nne$, i $ Terriv". Inna: "d times ay d tanezdu$t nnwen, ad degs twekkôem, siwa ma ur aS ihwi i Öebbi". Ih, Mass ik d Bab n ûûwab, d Amusnaw.
